Title: Provides funding for abortion services and travel-related expenses not covered by the military for certain New York state residents
Summary: Provides funding for abortion services and travel-related expenses not covered by the military for active duty members of the armed forces of the United States, or their spouses or dependents, who are New York state residents.
LawCode: Amd ยง2599-bb-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to funding for abortion services and travel-related expenses for New York state residents that are active duty members of the armed forces of the United States, or the spouse or dependent of such member
